        RegionColor 1 : (128,128,0);
        RegionColor 6,7: RB;
    }

        RegionColor 1 : aIN;
        RegionColor 9,10,13,14: IGNORE;
        }

        RegionColor 5,15,16 : UnknownRgn;

        RegionColor 1 : aIN;
        RegionColor 9,10,13,14: IGNORE;
